meanings.definition: A website that is part of a larger website.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy exploring different subsites on the internet.
meanings.sent2: The blog section is just one of the many subsites on the main website.
meanings.sent3: The subsites on the website are like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: Each subsite is a small window into the larger world of the main website.
meanings.sent5: Navigating through the subsites feels like going on a digital adventure.

meanings.definition: A location within a larger site or area.
meanings.sent1: The park has several subsites where families can have picnics.
meanings.sent2: The playground is one of the popular subsites in the community park.
meanings.sent3: The subsites in the forest are perfect spots for a peaceful retreat.
meanings.sent4: Each subsite in the city has its own unique charm and character.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the subsites of the museum feels like discovering hidden gems.
